title: Lunar skins?
body:
Hey guys, does any of you know if the Lunar skins that were released earlier this year for Caitlyn and Morgana are gonna be available sometime in the near future?
I searched for some time on google but I found no recent info about them.
Can I also get the answer/opinion of a Rioter?
Thanks.

replies.body:
If I remember correctly, all legacy skins (skins you can't buy anymore) become avaliable at Christmas ( that's if they repeat the same as they have done in pervious years). Nevertheless the next Chinese year is fast approaching, and once again they'll probably repeat as they did in  pervios years and release new lunar skins and make the old ones avaliable.


(TL;DR) Christmas/Chinese new year
Edit sorry for the long reply
Don't think so, mate, they said they went "INTO THE VAULT"
